activities: Net Atlantic is an Email Service Provider (ESP) that provides Software as a Service (SAAS) on a hosted platform which allows our clients to create, send, share, track and manage email. In the normal course of business, Net Atlantic does not disclose any client information to any third party, unless required by law or permitted by contractual obligations.
